source_sentence: 貞元新定釋教目錄卷第十九
translation: Zhenyan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts, Volume 19

source_sentence: 西京西明寺三藏沙門圓照撰
translation: By Yuanzhao, the Tripiṭaka Master of Ximing Temple, Xijingshi

source_sentence: 總集群經錄上之十九
translation: Zonglu jinglu Shangzhiyi

source_sentence: 敘列古今諸家目錄之二
translation: Catalogue of Ancient and Modern Scholars (No. 2)

source_sentence: 大唐開元釋教錄二十卷　庚午歲西崇福寺沙門智昇撰右此中所撰總分上下兩錄具件如左。
translation: Da Tang Kaiyuan shijiao lu (Da Tang Kaiyuan shijiao lu), 20 volumes, written by the monk Zhisheng of Chongfusi in the western part of the year Gengwu, is divided into two general records, the upper and lower, with the documents shown on the left.

source_sentence: 總集群經錄上(從漢至唐所出經教區別人代具顯此中目錄始終續於後列)。
translation: (From the Han Dynasty to the Tang Dynasty, the sūtras and doctrinal areas that were produced by other generations are clearly shown in this catalogue, which continues from beginning to end as listed later.)

source_sentence: 後漢傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: The later Han Dynasty transmitted twelve translators from black and white.

source_sentence: 所出經并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras that were produced, together with the old and new collections of lost sūtras, were translated.

source_sentence: 總二百九十二部合三百九十五卷(九十七部一百三十一卷見在一百五十五部二百六十卷闕本)。
translation: They comprise a total of two hundred and ninety-two sections and three hundred and ninety-five volumes (ninety-seven sections and one hundred and thirty-one volumes are found in the one hundred and fifty-five sections and two hundred and sixty volumes that are missing from the manuscript).

source_sentence: 曹魏傳譯沙門五人。
translation: Five ascetics of the Cao and Wei tradition translated the scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經戒羯磨。
translation: The sutras, precepts, and karma that they produced.

source_sentence: 總一十二部合一十八卷(四部五卷見在八部一十三卷闕本)。
translation: It's a collection of twelve sections and eighteen volumes (four sections and five volumes are found in the eight sections and thirteen volumes of the missing text).

source_sentence: 右為第一卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the first volume.

source_sentence: 吳代傳譯緇素五人。
translation: Five black and white monks who transmitted the scriptures to the Wu dynasty.

source_sentence: 所出經等并及失譯。
translation: The sūtras and so forth that were produced were also lost in translation.

source_sentence: 總一百八十九部合四百一十七卷(六十一部九十二卷見在一百二十八部三百二十五卷闕本)。
translation: There are a total of one hundred and eighty-nine sections comprising four hundred and seventeen volumes (sixty-one parts and ninety-two volumes are found in the one hundred and twenty-eight parts and three hundred and twenty-five volumes that are missing).

source_sentence: 西晉傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: In the Western Jin dynasty, there were twelve translators who transmitted the black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經戒等并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras, precepts, and other items that were produced, as well as the old and new collections of lost sūtras, were translated.

source_sentence: 總三百三十三部合五百九十一卷(一百五十六部二百三十一卷見在一百七十七部三百六十九卷本闕)。
translation: It's a collection of five hundred and ninety-one volumes out of three hundred and thirty-three (one hundred and fifty-six parts and two hundred and thirty-one volumes are missing from the one hundred and seventy-seven parts and three hundred and sixty-nine volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第二卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the second volume.

source_sentence: 東晉傳譯緇素一十六人。
translation: There were sixteen translators from the Eastern Jin dynasty who transmitted black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經律論并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and lost translations of old and new collections are all produced.

source_sentence: 總一百六十八部合四百六十八卷(八十五部三百三十六卷見在八十三部三百三十二卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise 468 volumes out of 168 (85 parts and 336 volumes are missing from the 83 parts and 332 volumes).

source_sentence: 符秦傳譯沙門六人。
translation: There were six ascetics who transmitted the translation from the Fuqin school.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等。
translation: They produced sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總一十五部合一百九十七卷(七部六十五卷見在八部一百三十二卷本闕)。
translation: There are fifteen collections of one hundred and ninety-seven volumes (seven collections of sixty-five volumes are missing from the eight collections of one hundred and thirty-two volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第三卷。
translation: The third volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 姚秦傳譯沙門五人。
translation: There are five ascetics who transmitted the translation from the Yao and Qin Dynasties.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and so forth that they produced were ninety-four books totaling six hundred volumes.

source_sentence: 總九十四部合六百二十四卷(六十六部五百二十八卷見在二十八部九十六卷闕本)。
translation: They compiled ninety-four sections into six hundred and twenty-four volumes (sixty-six sections and five hundred and twenty-eight volumes are missing from the twenty-eight sections and ninety-six volumes).

source_sentence: 乞伏秦傳譯沙門一人所出經并三秦代新舊失譯經律論等。
translation: The scriptures produced by one person who was a translator from the Qín dynasty, as well as the three old and new lost translations of scriptures, vinaya, and other treatises from the Qín dynasty.

source_sentence: 總五十六部合一百一十卷(三十二部七十九卷見在二十四部三十一卷闕本)。
translation: The total is fifty-six sections, comprising 110 volumes (thirty-two sections and seventy-nine volumes are missing from the twenty-four sections and thirty-one volumes).

source_sentence: 前涼傳譯外國優婆塞一人。
translation: There was one foreign Upāsaka who was translated from the Qianliang period.

source_sentence: 所出經。
translation: The sūtras that he produced.

source_sentence: 總四部合六卷(一部一卷見在三部五卷本闕)。
translation: There are four divisions and six volumes in total (one division and one volume are missing from the three-division, five-volume edition).

source_sentence: 北涼傳譯緇素九人。
translation: The Northern Liang Dynasty transmitted the translation of nine black sūtras.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: Their output consisted of sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and other sūtras that had been lost in translation from both the old and new collections.

source_sentence: 總八十二部合三百一十一卷(二十五部二百九卷見在五十七部一百二卷本闕)。
translation: There are 82 sections in total, comprising 311 volumes (25 sections of 299 volumes are missing from the 57 sections of 112 volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第四卷。
translation: The fourth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 宋代傳譯緇素二十二人。
translation: During the Song dynasty, twenty-two translators from the Black and White schools produced scriptures, vinaya, treatises, and other new works.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等并新集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and other texts that were produced were also newly collected and lost in translation.

source_sentence: 總四百六十五部合七百一十七卷(九十三部二百四十三卷見在三百七十二部四百七十四卷本闕)。
translation: These four hundred and sixty-five collections comprise seven hundred and seventeen volumes (ninety-three collections of 243 volumes are missing from the four hundred and seventy-four volumes in the three hundred and seventy-two collections).

source_sentence: 右為第五卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the fifth volume.

source_sentence: 蕭齊傳譯沙門七人。
translation: Xiao Qi transmitted the translation of seven ascetics.

source_sentence: 所出經律。
translation: The sūtras and vinaya that were produced.

source_sentence: 總一十二部合三十三卷(七部二十三卷見在五部五卷本闕)。
translation: There are twelve sections and thirty-three volumes in total (seven sections and twenty-three volumes are missing from the five sections and five volumes of the Shōtoku canon).

source_sentence: 梁代傳譯緇素八人。
translation: In the Liang Dynasty, eight black-and-white translators passed down the title.

source_sentence: 所出經論及諸傳記。
translation: The sūtras, treatises, and biographies that he produced were all new collections of lost sūtras and vinaya.

source_sentence: 并新集失譯經律集等。
translation: They also compiled a new collection of lost scriptures, vinaya, and other works.

source_sentence: 總四十六部。
translation: There are forty-six collections in all.

source_sentence: 合二百一十七卷(四十部一百九十一卷見在六部十卷本闕)。
translation: The total is 217 volumes (191 of the 40 are missing from the 10-volume edition of the Sixth Part).

source_sentence: 元魏傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: The Yuan and Wei dynasties transmitted twelve translators.

source_sentence: 所出經論。
translation: The sūtras and śāstras that they produced were eighty-three in number and two hundred and seventy-four in number.

source_sentence: 總八十三部合二百七十四卷(七十三部二百五十五卷見在一十部一十九卷本闕)。
translation: There are 83 sections and 274 volumes in total (73 sections and 255 volumes are missing from the 10 sections and 19 volumes).

source_sentence: 高齊傳譯緇素二人。
translation: The Gaoqi period saw the transmission of two black-skandha translators.

source_sentence: 所出經論。
translation: The sūtras and śāstras that they produced were eight in number and fifty-two in volume.

source_sentence: 總八部合五十二卷(並在無闕)。
translation: There are eight parts in total, comprising fifty-two volumes (and there are no missing volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第六卷。
translation: The sixth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 周朝傳譯沙門四人。
translation: Four ascetics from the Zhou dynasty transmitted the translation.

source_sentence: 所出經論等。
translation: Their output consisted of sūtras and treatises.

source_sentence: 總一十四部合二十九卷(六部一十一卷見在八部一十八卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise a total of twenty-nine volumes in fourteen sections (six sections and eleven volumes are missing from the eight sections and eighteen volumes).

source_sentence: 陳代傳譯緇素三人。
translation: In the Chen dynasty, three black and white monks conducted the translation.

source_sentence: 所出經律論及集傳等。
translation: Their output consisted of sūtras, vinaya, treatises, collected biographies, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總四十部合一百三十三卷(二十六部八十九卷見在一十四部四十四卷本闕)。
translation: There are forty sections in total, comprising 133 volumes (26 sections and 89 volumes are missing from the 14 sections and 44 volumes).

source_sentence: 隋朝傳譯緇素九人。
translation: There were nine translators from the Sui dynasty who transmitted black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經論傳錄等。
translation: The sūtras, treatises, biographies, and so forth that were produced.

source_sentence: 總九十九部合三百一卷(六十二部二百八十七卷見在二部一十四卷本闕)。
translation: There are ninety-nine parts in all, comprising three hundred and one volumes (sixty-two parts and two hundred and eighty-seven volumes are missing from the two-part, fourteen-volume edition).

source_sentence: 右為第七卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the seventh volume.

source_sentence: 皇朝傳譯緇素已有三十七人。
translation: In the imperial dynasty, there were thirty-seven translators and black-skinners.

source_sentence: 所出經律論及傳錄等。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, biographies, and so forth that they produced were three hundred and one books totaling 2,177 volumes.

source_sentence: 總三百一部合二千一百七十卷(二百八十一部二千一百四十三卷見在二十部二十七卷訪本未獲)。
translation: There are a total of three hundred and one and two thousand one hundred and seventy volumes in all (two hundred and eighty-one and two thousand one hundred and forty-three volumes are found in twenty parts and twenty-seven volumes of the unavailable text).

source_sentence: 都計一十九代傳譯道俗等。
translation: They all count nineteen generations of translators, Daoists, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總一百七十六人。
translation: There were a total of 176 of them.

source_sentence: 所出大小乘經律論及賢聖集傳。
translation: The scriptures, laws, treatises, and biographies of the noble ones that were produced were all of the 1,278.

source_sentence: 二千二百七十八部合七千四十六卷(一千一百三十部五千四十八卷見在一千一百四十八部一千九百九十八卷本闕)。
translation: There are 2,278 collections of scriptures, 28 treatises, and 7,446 volumes (1,130 collections of 5,48 volumes are missing from the 1,998 collections of 1,148 treatises).

source_sentence: 右為第八第九卷。
translation: On the right is the eighth and ninth fascicles.

source_sentence: 合從古錄至開元釋教新錄及續補舊闕。
translation: It combines the old records with the new records of the Śākyamuni teachings from the ancient records to the Kaiyuan period and continues to fill in old gaps.

source_sentence: 總有四十一家具如前列。
translation: The total is forty-one volumes of furniture as shown in the previous section.

source_sentence: 右為第十卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the tenth volume.

source_sentence: 別分乘藏錄下(上錄所辦總顯出經而大小未分三藏混雜此錄之內具件科條闕本等經續附於後)。
translation: Under the Record of the Special Section Vehicle Canon (the above record shows the scriptures in general and the three collections of large and small undistinguished mixed together in this record, with the complete textual organization of the missing texts and other scriptures being appended later).

source_sentence: 從別錄中曲分為七。
translation: From the separate records, we'll divide them into seven.

source_sentence: 有譯有本錄第一(一千一百二十四部五千四十八卷)。
translation: The first is the Catalogue of the Existent and Existing Buddhist Texts (1,124 sections and 5,488 volumes).

source_sentence: 復就此錄更開為三。
translation: This record is further divided into three.

source_sentence: 菩薩三藏錄第一(六百八十六部二千七百四十五卷)菩薩契經藏(五百七十三部二千一百七十三卷)大乘經單重合譯(總四百三十二部一千八百八十卷)般若經新舊譯(二十一部七百三十六卷)寶積經新舊譯(八十二部一百六十九卷)大集經新舊譯(三十四部一百四十二卷)花嚴經新舊譯(二十六部一百八十七卷)涅槃經新舊譯(六部五十八卷)五大部外諸重譯經(二百七十三部五百八十八卷)大乘經單譯(總一百三十一部二百九十三卷)菩薩調伏藏(二十六部五十四卷)菩薩對法藏(九十七部五百一十八卷)大乘釋經論(二十一部一百五十五卷)大乘集義論(七十六部三百六十三卷)右為第十一十二卷。
translation: 菩薩三藏錄第一(六百八十六部二千七百四十五卷)菩薩契經藏(五百七十三部二千一百七十三卷)大乘經單重合譯(總四百三十二部一千八百八十卷)般若經新舊譯(二十一部七百三十六卷)寶積經新舊譯(八十二部一百六十九卷)大集經新舊譯(三十四部一百四十二卷)花嚴經新舊譯(二十六部一百八十七卷)涅槃經新舊譯(六部五十八卷)五大部外諸重譯經(二百七十三部五百八十八卷)大乘經單譯(總一百三十一部二百九十三卷)菩薩調伏藏(二十六部五十四卷)菩薩對法藏(九十七部五百一十八卷)大乘釋經論(二十一部一百五十五卷)大乘集義論(七十六部三百六十三卷)右為第十一十二卷。

source_sentence: 聲聞三藏錄第二(三百三十部一千七百六十二卷)聲聞契經藏(二百四十部六百一十八卷)小乘經單重合譯(總一百五十三部三百九十四卷)根本四阿含經(五部二百三卷)長阿含中別譯經(二十二卷)中阿含中別譯經(六十卷)增壹阿含中別譯經(五十一卷)雜阿含中別譯經(五十卷)別譯雜阿含經(二十卷)四含外諸重譯經(一百四十八部一百九十一卷)小乘經單譯(總八十七部二百二十四卷)聲聞調伏藏(五十四部四百四十六卷)正調伏藏(四十一部三百五十八卷)調伏藏眷屬(一十三部八十八卷)聲聞對法藏(三十六部六百九十八卷)有部根本身足論(八部一百三十一卷)有部及餘支派論(二十八部五百六十七卷)聖賢傳記錄第三(一百八部五百四十一卷)梵本翻譯集傳(六十八部一百七十三卷)此方撰述集傳(四十部三百六十八卷)右為第十三卷。
translation: 聲聞三藏錄第二(三百三十部一千七百六十二卷)聲聞契經藏(二百四十部六百一十八卷)小乘經單重合譯(總一百五十三部三百九十四卷)根本四阿含經(五部二百三卷)長阿含中別譯經(二十二卷)中阿含中別譯經(六十卷)增壹阿含中別譯經(五十一卷)雜阿含中別譯經(五十卷)別譯雜阿含經(二十卷)四含外諸重譯經(一百四十八部一百九十一卷)小乘經單譯(總八十七部二百二十四卷)聲聞調伏藏(五十四部四百四十六卷)正調伏藏(四十一部三百五十八卷)調伏藏眷屬(一十三部八十八卷)聲聞對法藏(三十六部六百九十八卷)有部根本身足論(八部一百三十一卷)有部及餘支派論(二十八部五百六十七卷)聖賢傳記錄第三(一百八部五百四十一卷)梵本翻譯集傳(六十八部一百七十三卷)此方撰述集傳(四十部三百六十八卷)右為第十三卷。

source_sentence: 有譯無本錄第二(一千一百四十八部一千九百八十卷)大乘經闕本(四百八部八百一卷)大乘經重譯闕本(總二百部四百八十四卷)般若部中闕本(一十部二十七卷)寶積部中闕本(三十部五十四卷)大集部中闕本(一十三部九十七卷)花嚴部中闕本(一十二部二十七卷)涅槃部中闕本(四部二十六卷)諸重譯經闕本(一百三十一部二百五十三卷)大乘經單譯闕本(總二百八部三百一十七卷)大乘律闕本(二十二部二十五卷)大乘論闕本(二十部四十八卷)大乘釋經論闕本(四部一十一卷)大乘集義論闕本(一十六部三十七卷)右為第十四卷。
translation: 有譯無本錄第二(一千一百四十八部一千九百八十卷)大乘經闕本(四百八部八百一卷)大乘經重譯闕本(總二百部四百八十四卷)般若部中闕本(一十部二十七卷)寶積部中闕本(三十部五十四卷)大集部中闕本(一十三部九十七卷)花嚴部中闕本(一十二部二十七卷)涅槃部中闕本(四部二十六卷)諸重譯經闕本(一百三十一部二百五十三卷)大乘經單譯闕本(總二百八部三百一十七卷)大乘律闕本(二十二部二十五卷)大乘論闕本(二十部四十八卷)大乘釋經論闕本(四部一十一卷)大乘集義論闕本(一十六部三十七卷)右為第十四卷。

source_sentence: 小乘經闕本(六百五部八百一十五卷)小乘重譯經闕本(總一百二十五部二百六十五卷)根本四阿含闕本(二部一百九卷)長阿含部分闕本(一十四部二十八卷)中阿含部分闕本(一十四部一十四卷)增一阿含部分闕本(七部八卷)雜阿含部分闕本(四十五部四十五卷)諸重譯經闕本(四十三部六十二卷)小乘經單譯闕本(總四百八十部五百五十卷)小乘律闕本(三十七部四十二卷)賢聖集傳闕本(四十七部一百八十四卷)右為第十五卷。
translation: The lesser vehicle scriptures are deficient (605 parts, 815 volumes); the lesser vehicle re-translated scriptures are deficient (125 parts, 265 volumes); the four fundamental Āgamas are deficient (two parts, 190 volumes); the longer Āgamas are partially deficient (14 parts, 28 volumes); the middle Āgamas are partially deficient (14 parts, 14 volumes); the greater Āgamas are partially deficient (seven parts, 8 volumes); the miscellaneous Āgamas are partially deficient (45 parts, 45 volumes); the re-translated scriptures are deficient (43 parts, 62 volumes); the lesser vehicle scriptures are partially deficient (480 parts, 550 volumes); the lesser vehicle vinaya is deficient (37 parts, 42 volumes); the collection of wise sages is deficient (47 parts, 184 volumes); and the fifteenth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 並是舊譯今見有本。
translation: They are all old translations of which we now see a copy.

source_sentence: 大周入藏兼拾遺編入。
translation: It was compiled from the collections of the Dazhou emperor and the collected works.

source_sentence: 新譯大乘經(六十一部三百三十六卷)新譯大乘律(一部一卷)新譯大乘論(一十二部一十九卷)新譯小乘經(八部八卷)新譯小乘律(小乘論無新譯一十一部一百五十九卷)新譯賢聖集傳(三部五卷)右已上九十六部五百二十八卷並是大周刊定錄後。
translation: The new translation of the Mahāyāna sūtras (sixty-one parts, three hundred and thirty-six volumes), the new translation of the Mahāyāna Vinaya (one part, one volume), the new translation of the Mahāyāna śāstra (one part, one volume), the new translation of the lesser vehicle scriptures (eight parts, eight volumes), the new translation of the lesser vehicle vinaya (the lesser vehicle śāstra has no new translation of eleven parts, one hundred and fifty-nine volumes), and the new translation of the Biographies of the Noble Ones (three parts, five volumes), the right and the above ninety-six parts, five hundred and twenty-eight volumes, which were recorded after the finalization of the Dazhou Canon.

source_sentence: 新譯所以前錄未載。
translation: The new translation was therefore not included in the previous record.

source_sentence: 今補闕編。
translation: This is a supplement to the missing part.

source_sentence: 又小乘律戒羯磨(六部一十卷然並撰述有據時代盛行補闕編入)。
translation: Also, the lesser vehicle vinaya precepts karma (six parts and ten volumes, but also written and compiled according to the prevalence of the era, with additions and supplements added).

source_sentence: 又此方所撰集傳(四十部三百六十八卷然皆補助正教故然補闕編入目錄)。
translation: Also, the biographies of the collections written in this area (forty sections and three hundred and sixty-eight volumes, though all of them supplement the true teaching, so the addendum is included in the table of contents).

source_sentence: 右為第十七卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the seventeenth volume.

source_sentence: 疑惑再詳錄第六(一十四部一十九卷)偽妄亂真錄第七(三百九十四部或九十四一千五十七卷或五十五卷未詳)開元釋教錄新編偽經(三十九部或三十七五十六卷或五十四未詳)苻秦釋道安錄中偽經(二十五部二十八卷)梁釋僧祐錄中偽經(一十四部一十六卷)簫齊釋道備偽撰經(見長房錄五部五卷)簫齊僧法尼誦出經(僧祐等錄並編入偽二十一部三十五卷)元魏孫敬夢授經(見內典錄一部一卷)梁沙門妙光偽造經(見僧祐錄一部一卷)隋開皇眾經錄中偽經(八十六部一百四十一卷)隋仁壽眾經錄中偽經(一十一部四十一卷)大唐內典錄中偽經(二十二部八十七卷)大周刊定錄中偽經(八十部或二十未詳一百一卷)隋沙門信行三階集偽錄(周錄雖載收之不盡三十五部　四十四卷)諸雜抄經增減聖說(五十四部　五百一卷)有為第十八卷。
translation: 疑惑再詳錄第六(一十四部一十九卷)偽妄亂真錄第七(三百九十四部或九十四一千五十七卷或五十五卷未詳)開元釋教錄新編偽經(三十九部或三十七五十六卷或五十四未詳)苻秦釋道安錄中偽經(二十五部二十八卷)梁釋僧祐錄中偽經(一十四部一十六卷)簫齊釋道備偽撰經(見長房錄五部五卷)簫齊僧法尼誦出經(僧祐等錄並編入偽二十一部三十五卷)元魏孫敬夢授經(見內典錄一部一卷)梁沙門妙光偽造經(見僧祐錄一部一卷)隋開皇眾經錄中偽經(八十六部一百四十一卷)隋仁壽眾經錄中偽經(一十一部四十一卷)大唐內典錄中偽經(二十二部八十七卷)大周刊定錄中偽經(八十部或二十未詳一百一卷)隋沙門信行三階集偽錄(周錄雖載收之不盡三十五部　四十四卷)諸雜抄經增減聖說(五十四部　五百一卷)有為第十八卷。

source_sentence: 大乘入藏錄上(大乘經律論總六百三十八部二千七百四十五卷　二百五十八帙此直述注名及摽紙數餘如廣錄)大乘經(五百六十三部　二千一百七十三卷　二百三帙)大乘律(二十六部　五十四卷　五帙)大乘論(九十七部　五百一十八卷　五十帙)右為第十九卷。
translation: Dasheng xizang lu shang (Dasheng jing, lü, and lun, totaling 638 parts, 2,745 volumes, and 248 books), Dasheng jing (563 parts, 2,173 volumes, and 233 books), Dasheng lü (26 parts, 514 volumes, and 5 books), and Dasheng lun (97 parts, 518 volumes, and 50 books) are the nineteenth volume.

source_sentence: 小乘入藏錄下(小乘經律論總三百三十一部　一千七百六十二卷　一百六十五帙集傳錄附此直述經名及摽紙數餘如廣錄)小乘經(二百四十部　六百一十八卷　四十八帙)小乘律(五十四部　四百四十六卷　四十五帙)小乘論(三十六部　六百九十八卷　七十二帙)賢聖集(一百八部　五百四十一卷　五十七帙)都計大小乘經律論及賢聖傳見入藏者。
translation: Under the Record of the Entry into the Canon of the Lesser Vehicle (the total of the lesser vehicle scriptures, vinaya, and treatises is 331 parts, 1,762 volumes, and 165 books, with the names of the scriptures and the number of biographies annexed here, and the rest are as in the extensive record), the lesser vehicle scriptures (240 parts, 618 volumes, 48 books), the lesser vehicle vinaya (54 parts, 446 volumes, 45 books), the lesser vehicle treatises (36 parts, 698 volumes, 72 books), and the collection of sages (108 parts, 541 volumes, 57 books) are all considered to be the major and minor vehicle scriptures, vinaya, and treatises, and the biographies of sages that have entered the canon.

source_sentence: 總一千七十六部　合五千四十八卷　四百八十帙(此入藏中大乘經部數與前廣錄部數不同者以前大寶積經諸部合成故在本數為四十九部上錄此中合為一部故欠四十八不同)。
translation: (The number of Mahāyāna sūtras in the collection differs from the number of sūtras in the preceding extensive record because the original number of sūtras in the collection was forty-nine, and the number of sūtras in the preceding record was forty-eight because they were combined into one.)

source_sentence: 右為第二十卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the twentieth volume.

source_sentence: (庚辰歲西明寺翻經臨壇賜紫沙門圓照等奉勅撰)。
translation: (Compiled by Imao, the purple-granting monk Yuanzhao, who translated the scriptures at Ximing Temple during the year of Gengchen.)

source_sentence: 貞元新定釋教目錄三十卷
translation: The Zhenyan Revised List of the Buddhist Canon (30 volumes)

source_sentence: 右此中所撰准舊。
translation: The writings in this right-hand section are based on the old ones.

source_sentence: 亦總分上下兩錄。
translation: It is also divided into two general records: the upper and lower.

source_sentence: 具件如左。
translation: The documents are shown on the left.

source_sentence: 總集群經錄上。
translation: The general grouping of the sūtras is above the record.

source_sentence: 此中分二。
translation: There are two divisions in this.

source_sentence: 一特奉制旨。
translation: The first is by special order.

source_sentence: 二總集群經。
translation: The second is a general record of the sūtras.

source_sentence: 後漢傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: The Latter Han Dynasty transmitted the translations of twelve black and white sūtras.

source_sentence: 所出經律并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras and vinaya that they produced, as well as the old and new collections of lost sūtras, were translated.

source_sentence: 總二百九十二部合三百九十五卷(九十七部一百三十一卷見在一百九十五部二百六十卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise a total of two hundred and ninety-two sections and three hundred and ninety-five volumes (ninety-seven sections and one hundred and thirty-one volumes are missing from the one hundred and ninety-five sections and two hundred and sixty volumes).

source_sentence: 曹魏傳譯沙門五人。
translation: There were five ascetics who transmitted the translation from Cao and Wei.

source_sentence: 所出經戒羯磨。
translation: The sutras, precepts, and karma that they produced.

source_sentence: 總一十二部合一十八卷(四部五卷見在八部一十三卷本闕)。
translation: It consists of twelve sections and eighteen volumes (four sections and five volumes are missing from the eight sections and thirteen volumes).

source_sentence: 吳代傳譯緇素五人。
translation: In the Wu Dynasty, five black-and-white translators transmitted the scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經等并及失譯。
translation: The sūtras and other texts that were produced were also lost in translation.

source_sentence: 總一百八十九部合四百一十七卷(六十一部九十二卷見在一百二十八部三百二十五卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise a total of one hundred and eighty-nine parts in four hundred and seventeen volumes (sixty-one parts and ninety-two volumes are missing from the one hundred and twenty-eight parts and three hundred and twenty-five volumes).

source_sentence: 西晉傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: In the Western Jin dynasty, there were twelve translators who transmitted the black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經戒等并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: The sūtras, precepts, and other items that were produced, as well as the old and new collections of lost sūtras, were translated.

source_sentence: 總三百三十三部合五百九十一卷(一百五十六部三百三十一卷見在一百七十七部二百六十九卷本闕)。
translation: The total is 591 volumes out of 333 (156 and 331 are missing from the 167 part, 269 volume edition).

source_sentence: 右為第一第二第三第四卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the first, second, third, and fourth fascicles.

source_sentence: 東晉傳譯緇素一十六人。
translation: There were sixteen translators from the Eastern Jin dynasty who transmitted the black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經律論并新舊集失譯經一百六十八部。
translation: They produced one hundred and sixty-eight sūtras, vinaya treatises, and lost translations of old and new collections.

source_sentence: 合四百六十八卷(八十五部三百三十六卷見在八十三部三百三十二卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise four hundred and sixty-eight volumes (eighty-five parts and three hundred and thirty-six volumes are missing from the eighty-three parts and three hundred and thirty-two volumes).

source_sentence: 苻秦傳譯沙門六人。
translation: There were six ascetics who transmitted the translation from the Fuqin school.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and so forth that they produced were fifteen in number.

source_sentence: 總一十五部。
translation: There are fifteen collections of scriptures, vinaya, and other treatises.

source_sentence: 合一百九十七卷(七部六十五卷見在八部一百三十二卷闕本)。
translation: They consist of one hundred and ninety-seven volumes (seven parts and sixty-five volumes are missing from the eight parts and one hundred and thirty-two volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第五卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the fifth volume.

source_sentence: 姚秦傳譯沙門五人。
translation: There are five ascetics who transmitted the translation from Yao and Qin.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and so forth that they produced were ninety-four in number.

source_sentence: 總九十四部。
translation: It's ninety-four books in total.

source_sentence: 合六百二十四卷(六十六部五百二十八卷見在二十八部九十六卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise 624 volumes (66 sections and 528 volumes are missing from the 28 sections and 96 volumes).

source_sentence: 乞伏秦傳譯沙門一人。
translation: There was one monk who submitted a translation from the Qin dynasty.

source_sentence: 所出經并三秦代新舊失譯經律論等。
translation: The sūtras that he produced included three old and new lost translations of scriptures, vinaya, and treatises from the Qin dynasty.

source_sentence: 總五十六部。
translation: There are fifty-six books in all.

source_sentence: 合一百一十卷(三十二部七十九卷見在二十四部三十一卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise 110 volumes (32 parts and 79 volumes are missing from the 24 parts and 31 volumes of the present text).

source_sentence: 前涼傳譯外國優婆塞一人。
translation: There was one foreign Upāsaka who was a translator from the Qianliang period.

source_sentence: 所出經總四部合六卷(一部一卷見在三部五卷本闕)。
translation: The sūtras that he produced were four in total and six in number (one part and one volume are missing from the three-part, five-volume edition).

source_sentence: 北涼傳譯緇素九人。
translation: The Northern Liang Dynasty had a black and white translation service that consisted of nine people.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等并新舊集失譯諸經。
translation: Their output consisted of sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and other sūtras that had been lost in translation from both the old and new collections.

source_sentence: 總八十二部。
translation: It's a collection of 82 sūtras.

source_sentence: 合三百一十一卷(一十五部二百九卷見在五十七部一百二卷本闕)。
translation: They total 311 volumes (15 parts and 299 volumes are missing from the 57 parts and 129 volumes).

source_sentence: 右為第六卷。
translation: The sixth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 宋代傳譯緇素二十二人。
translation: During the Song Dynasty, twenty-two people transmitted translations into black and white.

source_sentence: 所出經律論等并集失譯諸經。
translation: They produced sūtras, vinaya, treatises, and other texts, as well as a collection of lost sūtras.

source_sentence: 總四百六十五部。
translation: It's a collection of 465 sūtras.

source_sentence: 合七百一十七卷(九十三部二百四十三卷見在三百七十三部四百七十四卷本闕)。
translation: It's a collection of 717 volumes (93 parts and 243 volumes are missing from the original text of 373 parts and 474 volumes).

source_sentence: 簫齊傳譯沙門七人。
translation: There were seven śrāmaṇeras who transmitted translations from the Xiao and Qi Dynasties.

source_sentence: 所出經律。
translation: The sūtras and vinaya that they produced were twelve in number.

source_sentence: 總一十二部。
translation: There are twelve collections of sūtras and vinaya.

source_sentence: 合三十三卷(七部二十八卷見在五卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise thirty-three fascicles (seven parts and twenty-eight fascicles are missing from the five-fascicle edition).

source_sentence: 右為第七第八卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the seventh and eighth fascicles.

source_sentence: 梁代傳譯緇素九人。
translation: Nine people from the Liang Dynasty who transmitted the Śākyamuni sūtras and vinaya.

source_sentence: 所出經論。
translation: The sūtras and treatises that were produced.

source_sentence: 及諸傳記并新集失譯經律集等。
translation: These are the sūtras and treatises, the biographies, the new collections of lost sūtras and vinaya collections, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總四十七部。
translation: There are forty-seven collections in all.

source_sentence: 合二百一十七卷(四十一部二百七卷見在六部十卷本闕)。
translation: It's a total of 217 volumes (41 collections of 217 volumes are missing from the six collections of 10 volumes).

source_sentence: 元魏傳譯緇素一十二人。
translation: The Yuan and Wei dynasties transmitted twelve translators.

source_sentence: 所出經論總八十三部。
translation: The sūtras and treatises that he produced total 83.

source_sentence: 合二百七十四卷(七十三部二百五十五卷見在一十部一十九卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise 274 volumes (73 parts and 255 volumes are missing from the 10 parts and 19 volumes of the present edition).

source_sentence: 高齊傳譯緇素二人。
translation: The Gaoqi period saw the transmission of two black-skandha translators.

source_sentence: 所出經論。
translation: The sūtras and śāstras that they produced were eight in number and fifty-two in volume.

source_sentence: 總八部合五十二卷(並在無闕)。
translation: There are eight sections in total, comprising fifty-two fascicles (and nothing missing in the text).

source_sentence: 右為第九卷。
translation: The ninth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 周朝傳譯沙門四人。
translation: Four ascetics from the Zhou dynasty transmitted the translation.

source_sentence: 所出經論等。
translation: The sūtras and treatises that they produced were fourteen in number.

source_sentence: 總一十四部。
translation: There are fourteen collections of sūtras and treatises in total.

source_sentence: 合二十九卷(六部一十一卷見在八部一十八卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise twenty-nine volumes (six divisions and eleven volumes are missing from the eight divisions and eighteen volumes).

source_sentence: 陳代傳譯緇素三人。
translation: There were three black and white monks who conducted the translation during the Chan period.

source_sentence: 所出經律論及集傳等。
translation: Their output consisted of sūtras, vinaya, treatises, collected biographies, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總四十部。
translation: There are forty books in all.

source_sentence: 合一百三十三卷(二十六部八十九卷見在一十四部四十四卷本闕)。
translation: They comprise 133 volumes (26 parts and 89 volumes are missing from the 14 parts and 44 volumes).

source_sentence: 隋朝傳譯緇素十人。
translation: In the Sui dynasty, ten translators from Kāśyapa transmitted the sūtras and vinaya.

source_sentence: 所出經論傳集錄等。
translation: They produced sūtras, treatises, collections, and other records.

source_sentence: 總九十九部。
translation: There are ninety-nine books in all.

source_sentence: 合三百四十五卷(九十七部三百三十一卷見在二部一十四卷本闕)。
translation: They total 345 volumes (97 parts and 331 volumes are missing from the 14-volume edition of Part II).

source_sentence: 右為第十卷。
translation: The tenth volume is on the right.

source_sentence: 皇朝傳譯緇素已有四十六人。
translation: In the imperial dynasty, there were forty-six translators who transmitted black and white scriptures.

source_sentence: 所出經律論及傳錄等。
translation: The sūtras, vinaya treatises, biographies, and so forth that they produced were four hundred and thirty-four in total.

source_sentence: 總四百三十四部。
translation: There are 434 of them in total.

source_sentence: 合二千四百六十三卷(四百十部二千三百八十六卷見在二十七部七十七卷訪本未獲足)。
translation: They total 2,463 volumes (out of the 4,010, 2,386 are found in 27 parts and 77 volumes, the visiting copy of which has not been obtained).

source_sentence: 都計一十九代傳譯道俗。
translation: They all counted nineteen generations of translators, Daoists, and seculars.

source_sentence: 總一百八十七人。
translation: There were a total of 187 of them.

source_sentence: 所出大小乘經律論及賢聖集傳。
translation: The scriptures, laws, treatises, and biographies of the noble ones that were produced totaled 2,447.

source_sentence: 總二千四百四十七部。
translation: There are 2,447 of them in total.

source_sentence: 合七千三百七十九卷(一千二百五十七部五千三百七十八卷見在一千一百五十五部二千四十八卷本闕內五十遺編律文七部五十卷闕三十卷故此重摽五十卷)。
translation: (The 1,257 sections and 5,378 volumes are found in the 1,155 sections and 2,48 volumes missing from the previous edition of 50 volumes, and the seven sections and 50 volumes of the remaining vinaya are missing 30 volumes; therefore, 50 volumes are re-programmed.)

source_sentence: 右為第十一十二十三十四十五十六十七卷。
translation: On the right is the eleventh, twentieth, thirty, forty-four, fifteen, sixteen, and seventeen fascicles.

source_sentence: 合從古錄至貞元新定釋教目錄及。
translation: It combines the catalogs of the Śākyas and the teachings from the ancient records to Zhenyan's new edition.

source_sentence: 續補舊闕。
translation: It continues to fill in old gaps.

source_sentence: 總有四十二家。
translation: In all, there are forty-two scholars.

source_sentence: 具如前列。
translation: It's listed at the top.

source_sentence: 右為第十八十九卷。
translation: The right-hand volume is the eighteenth and nineteenth.

source_sentence: 別分乘藏錄下(上餘所辯總顯出經而大小未分三藏混雜此錄之內具件科條闕本等經續附於後)。
translation: Under the Record of the Special Vehicle Canon (the rest of the above-mentioned commentary generally shows that the scriptures that emerged were mixed with the three collections of large and small, but the complete textual organization of the missing scriptures in this record is appended later).

source_sentence: 此中分二。
translation: There are two parts to this.

source_sentence: 初別分乘藏。
translation: The first is the Canon of the Distinct Vehicle.

source_sentence: 二賢傳記。
translation: The second is the biographical records of Bhadrayān.

source_sentence: 就別錄曲分第七。
translation: In the case of the seventh part of the separate records, it's the Curvular Section.

source_sentence: 有譯有本錄第一(一千二百五十六部五千三百七十八卷)。
translation: There's the first translation of the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts (1,256 sections and 5,378 volumes).

source_sentence: 復就此錄更開為二。
translation: This record is further divided into two.

source_sentence: 一三藏差殊。
translation: One is the Tripiṭaka of the Three Treasures.

source_sentence: 二聖賢傳記。
translation: The second is the biographies of the sages.

source_sentence: 三藏復二。
translation: There are two more Tripiṭaka collections.

source_sentence: 一菩薩三藏。
translation: The first is the bodhisattva tripiṭaka.

source_sentence: 二聲聞三藏。
translation: The śrāvaka Tripiṭaka and the śrāvaka Tripiṭaka.

translation: The first is a collection of biographies of translations of the Sanskrit texts (sixty-eight parts and one hundred and seventy-three volumes), and the second is a collection of biographies of writings from this region (forty-four parts and four hundred and eighteen volumes).

translation: The Abridged and Repeated Record No. 4 (147 parts, 448 volumes) is a new collection of separately produced sūtras (67 parts, 185 volumes), a new collection of well-known sūtras with different texts (30 parts, 52 volumes), a new collection of sūtras from the same collection (8 parts, 30 volumes), a new collection of sūtras from the same collection (52 parts, 141 volumes), and a new collection of sūtras from the same collection (36 parts, 1,111 volumes).

source_sentence: 大周入藏中無。
translation: It's not in the Tripiṭaka of the Dazhou.

source_sentence: 今拾遺編入。
translation: We are now collecting the remainder and compiling it into this collection.

source_sentence: 新譯大乘經(六十一部三百三十六卷)新譯大乘律(一部一卷)新譯大乘論(一十二部一十九卷)新譯小乘經(八部八卷)新譯小乘律(小乘論無新譯一十一部一百五十九卷)新譯賢聖集傳(三部五卷)右已上九十六部(五百二十八卷)並是大周刊定錄後新譯所以前錄未載。
translation: The new translation of the Mahāyāna sūtras (sixty-one parts, three hundred and thirty-six volumes), the new translation of the Mahāyāna sūtras (one part, one volume), the new translation of the Mahāyāna śāstra (twelve parts, one volume), the new translation of the lesser vehicle sūtras (eight parts, eight volumes), the new translation of the lesser vehicle śāstra (eleven parts, one hundred and fifty-nine volumes, no new translation of the lesser vehicle śāstra), the new translation of the Biographies of the Noble Ones (three parts, five volumes), and the above ninety-six parts (five hundred and twenty-eight volumes) were not recorded in the previous record because they were newly translated after the finalization of the Dazhou Catalogue.

source_sentence: 今補闕編入。
translation: It is now added to the list of deficiencies.

source_sentence: 又小乘律戒羯磨(六部一十卷然並撰述有據時代盛行補闕編入)。
translation: Also, the lesser vehicle vinaya precepts karma (six parts and ten volumes, but also written according to the prevalence of the era and supplemented by the deficiencies in the compilation).

source_sentence: 又此方所撰集傳(四十部三百六十八卷然皆補助正教並補闕編入見錄)。
translation: Also, this is the collection of biographies compiled by this author (forty parts, three hundred and sixty-eight volumes, all of which are supplements to the true teaching and are included in the record with additions).

source_sentence: 又此方撰集經(一部一十六卷或十八卷)。
translation: Also, this party compiled the Collected Passages (one 16- or 18-fascicle work).

source_sentence: 右撿舊錄。
translation: It's right out of the old records.

source_sentence: 在偽妄亂真錄中。
translation: It's in the Record of Fake, False, and Distorted Truth.

source_sentence: 今准勅編入貞元新定釋教目錄(此一朝傳出梁朝今准入錄年代唐朝年月日編在梁末)。
translation: It was compiled in the Zhenyan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts (this one was transmitted from the Liang dynasty to the Tang dynasty and was compiled at the end of the Liang dynasty in terms of years, months, and days).

source_sentence: 又此方法琳別傳三卷。
translation: There is also a separate three-volume biography of this method of Lin.

source_sentence: 右開元錄。
translation: The Right Record of the Kaiyuan Era.

source_sentence: 中禁斷。
translation: It was forbidden to stop in the middle.

source_sentence: 今再詳准勅編入貞元釋教錄。
translation: This is now further detailed, accurate, and compiled into the Zhenyuan Record of the Teaching of the Buddhas.

source_sentence: 又此方續開元釋教錄一部三卷。
translation: Also, this is a three-volume sequel to the Record of the Śākyamuni teachings.

source_sentence: 准勅編入貞元釋教錄。
translation: It was compiled into the Zhenyuan Shakyukyō Record in accordance with Ima-mai.

source_sentence: 又此方撰述目錄一部三十卷(准例編入貞元新定釋教目錄)。
translation: It's also a 30-volume catalog of the writings of this school (compiled into the Zhenyan New Definition of the Teaching Catalog in accordance with the precedent).

source_sentence: 右為第二十七卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the twenty-seventh volume.

translation: 疑惑再詳錄第六(一十四部一十九卷)偽妄亂真錄第七(三百九十四部一千四十一卷)開元釋教錄新編偽經(三十九部五十六卷)符秦釋道安錄中偽經(三十五部二十八卷)梁釋僧祐錄中偽經(一十四部一十六卷)蕭齊釋道備偽撰經(見長房錄)五卷元魏孫敬德夢授經(見內典錄一部一卷)梁沙門妙光偽造經(見僧祐錄一部一卷)隋開皇眾經中偽經(八十六部一百四十一卷)隋仁壽眾經錄中偽經(一十一部四十一卷)大唐內典錄中偽經(二十二部八十七卷)大周刊定錄中偽經(八十部一百一卷)隋沙門信行三階集錄(周錄雖載收之不盡三十五部　四十四卷)諸雜抄經增減聖說(五十四部　五百一卷)右為第二十八卷。

source_sentence: 大乘入藏錄上(大乘經律論總七百六十三部　二千九百五十八卷　二百六十七帙此直列經名及標紙數餘如廣錄)大乘經(六百八十六部　二千七百四十五卷　二百二十帙)大乘律(二十七部　五十五卷　五帙)大乘論(九十九部　五百二十卷　五十帙)右為第二十九卷。
translation: Dasheng zangzang lu shang (763 Dasheng jing lu lun, 2,958 volumes, 2,607 books), Dasheng jing (686 Dasheng jing, 2,745 volumes, 220 books), Dasheng lun (27 Dasheng jing, 55 volumes, 5 books), Dasheng lun (99 Dasheng jing, 520 volumes, 50 books), and the right-hand side is volume 29.

source_sentence: 小乘藏入藏錄下(小乘經律論總四百四十七部　二千三百八十九卷　一百七十帙傳錄附此未此直述經名及標紙數餘如廣錄)小乘經(二百四十部　六百一十八卷　四十八帙)小乘律(六十一部　四百九十三卷　五十帙)小乘論(三十六部　六百九十八卷　七十帙)賢聖集(一百一十二部　五百九十一卷　六十四帙)都大小乘經律論及賢聖傳見入藏者。
translation: (447 sections, 2,389 volumes, and 170 books of lesser vehicle scriptures, vinaya, and treatises are appended to this record.) The lesser vehicle scriptures (240 sections, 618 volumes, and 48 books), lesser vehicle vinaya (61 sections, 493 volumes, and 50 books), lesser vehicle treatises (36 sections, 698 volumes, and 70 books), and the collection of sages (112 sections, 591 volumes, and 64 books) are all major and minor vehicle scriptures, vinaya, and treatises, and the biographies of sages that have been admitted to the collection.

source_sentence: 總一千二百五十六部。
translation: There are 1,256 of them in total.

source_sentence: 合五千三百七十八卷。
translation: It's 5,378 volumes in total.

source_sentence: 五百九帙。
translation: There are five hundred and nine books.

source_sentence: 此入藏中大乘經部數與前廣錄數不同者。
translation: The number of Mahāyāna sūtras in this collection differs from the number in the previous extensive record.

source_sentence: 前以大寶積經諸部合成。
translation: In the past, the Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra was a composite of the various divisions.

source_sentence: 故存本數為四十九部上錄。
translation: Therefore, the original number of books stored here was forty-nine books in the above record.

source_sentence: 此中合為一部。
translation: Here, they're combined into one.

source_sentence: 故欠四十八。
translation: Therefore, it's missing forty-eight.

source_sentence: 不同。
translation: It's not the same.

source_sentence: 右為第三十卷。
translation: The right-hand side is the thirtieth volume.

source_sentence: 貞元新定釋教目錄卷第十九
translation: Zhenyan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts, Vol. 19

source_sentence: 貞元十五年十月二十三日奉勅修撰。
translation: On the 23rd day of the 10th month in the 15th year of the Zhenyan period, I was instructed to revise this text.

source_sentence: 至十六年四月十五日畢進。
translation: It was completed on the fifteenth day of the fourth month of the sixteenth year.

source_sentence: 上五月十日勅下流行。
translation: On the tenth day of the fifth month, Imao issued this order for public consumption.

source_sentence: 翻經都句當右街諸寺觀釋道二教事千福寺上座沙門靈邃奏撰。
translation: This is a translation of the sūtra prepared by the superior monk at Qianfusi, Lingsio, who observed the two teachings in the temples on Dujutang's right side.

source_sentence: 翻經臨壇西明寺賜紫沙門圓照等奉勅撰右神策軍中尉兼右街功德使金紫光錄大夫行右監門衛將軍賜紫金魚袋第伍守亮等進。
translation: The sūtra was compiled by Imaizhao, the purple-granting ascetic Yuanzhao of the Ximing Temple in Lintan, and it was also compiled by Imaizhao, the gold-violet Guanglu Dafu, the right supervising general of the gate guards, who was granted a purple-gold fish bag by Wu Shouliang and others.

source_sentence: 右神策軍護軍中尉兼左街功德使元從興元開府儀同三司行左監門衛大將軍知內侍省事上柱國頒國公食邑。
translation: The right lieutenant of the guardian army of the Shensze army and the left minister of merit, Yuan Zongxing Yuan, Kaifu, Yisanji, and the lineal commander of the left guard, who was in charge of the internal affairs department, and the superior minister of the state, Dou Wenchang, were among those who received the eunuch of the state.

source_sentence: 三千戶臣竇文場等同進。
translation: Dou Wenchang, a minister of the 3,000 households, advanced as well.
